subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution: EAST MEDITERRANEAN: Levant and Iran ( Ascher & Pickering 2021 ).

Flower records. Asteraceae :
Echinops viscosus
; Fabaceae :
Lotus sp.
,
Ononis spinosa
; Lamiaceae :
Phlomis
cf
brachyodon
,
Salvia microstegia
,
Stachys cretica
,
Stachys distans
,
Stachys ehrenbergii
.

Mavromoustakis (1963) recorded specimens from Lebanon on Lamiaceae as well, visiting
Teucrium divaricatum var. graecum
.
